mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_survey (title, description, create_time, status, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, NOW(), 1, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_survey ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT a.response_id, a.question_id, a.answer_value, r.submit_time FROM t_answer a LEFT JOIN t_survey_response r ON a.response_id = r.id WHERE r.survey_id = #{surveyId} ORDER BY r.submit_time DESC, a.question_id ASC
